column1: hi I arranged a provisional site
we need to start putting content we can start with our bios and a couple of blog posts
we can work on the design later
the form is there but it seems like is not working
I have to solve that
also can you send me the social media accounts
so we can link to the site
also I want to offer the site content in different languages we should position the company as a global company since the start
the site looks good
here are social media accounts
and yes I agree offering the site in different languages as well as making it a global company
we do not want to limit ourselves to just one market
thanks that is just a standard template but we definitely need to design it more
hey Michael look at this website I found while reading an article
this is what we want to do but on a different level
hey Michael how is it going
hi sorry my bosses are in New York from Los Angeles and I will be in meetings all day until Thursday
haha I know the feeling
have you assigned Alex and Abel onto the website
do you mean Jiri or the site
both
they are added to I resent invites yesterday
hey Michael  I called you to briefly go over a few things
first is a developer timeline if you can make a timeline for all developers and designers to follow that way we they know when to complete their task
also my friend Michael has invited us to the New York virtual reality expo coming up soon
he is attempting to get tickets so we can attend
he also would like to be on the advisory board and use our company for a trial run case study for his company
here is his website if you want to check it out
